SA13n1145:1: kaumārye paṭhyatāṃ vidyā śaitye saṃpālyatāṃ ca gauḥ |
SA13n1145:2: kṣettraṃ ca karṣyatāṃ pītaṃ trayaḥ sufalahetavaḥ ||1 ||
SA13n1145:3: gate'pi vayasi grāhyā vidyā sarvātmanā budhaiḥ |
SA13n1145:7: guṇini guṇajño ramate nāguṇaśīlasya guṇini paritoṣaḥ |
SA13n1145:12: guṇāḥ kurvanti dūtatvaṃ dūre'pi basatāṃ satām |
SA13n1145:14: vidvatvaṃ ca nṛpatvaṃ ca naiva tulyaṃ kadācana |
SA13n1145:15: svadeśe pūjyate rājā vidvān sarvatra pūjyate ||8 ||
SA13n1145:21: vicchedānna hi cāntaraṃ kimapi tat tyājyaṃ na kiṃ tatsthalam |
SA13n1145:22: vaivaśyādhdi viyogato manasi jāyante vidhātā ati
SA13n1145:23: tatsthānaṃ yadi hīyate sahajataḥ syāccātiśāntiḥ sukham ||10 ||
SA13n1145:26: prapañcā yatnaoto heyāḥ saṃsargaḥ kriyatāṃ satām |
SA13n1145:34: yadudeti vinā sūrya tejasvi tanna jāyate |
SA13n1145:37: mūdhni vā sarvalokasya śīryate vana eva vā ||16 |
SA13n1145:38: vāṇi kaṭhorā bhaṇitā hi duṣṭairyā sarparupā sujanān hinasti |
SA13n1145:39: te bheṣajaṃ kṣāntimayaṃ ca prajñāṃ saṃsevya cintārahitā bhavanti ||17 ||
SA13n1145:41: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodeti punaḥ śaśī ||18 ||
SA13n1145:44: vanāni dahato vahneḥ sakhā bhavati mārutaḥ |
SA13n1145:45: sa eva dīpanāśāya kṛśe kasyāsti sauhṛdam ||20 ||
SA13n1145:50: dūrastho'pi samīpastho yo yasya manasi sthitaḥ |
SA13n1145:52: pareṣāṃ vaibhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā mano yasya prakupyati |
SA13n1145:53: na tasyārthopalabdhistu citaṃ puṇyaṃ ca naśyati ||24 ||
SA13n1145:54: rāgopamaṃ nāsti malaṃ hi loke īrṣyopamā nāsti ca kā'pi hāniḥ |
SA13n1145:55: yāñcāsamo nāsti ca ko'pi bandhurdānopamo nāsti ca mitravargaḥ ||25 ||
SA13n1145:56: kṣudhāsamā nāsti śarīravedanā cintāsamā nāsti śarīraśoṣaṇā |
SA13n1145:57: guṇaiḥ samā nāsti śarīrabhūṣaṇā kṣāntyā samaṃ nāsti śarīravarmaṃ vai ||26 ||
SA13n1145:58: dhanena kiṃ kṣudrajanasya mitraiḥ kiṃ vañcakasyāpi ca matsarasya |
SA13n1145:59: kiṃ hānidasyātiguṇagrahaiśca kiṃ vā vipattau vimukhātmajena ||27 ||
SA13n1145:60: sarvathā svahitamācaraṇīyaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati jano bahujalpaḥ |
SA13n1145:61: bidyate hi na sa kaścidupāyaḥ sarvalokaparitoṣakaro yaḥ ||28 ||
SA13n1145:63: satyāsatye ca maitridveṣau kuryāt svaparaiḥ saha ||29 ||
SA13n1145:64: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvamapi ghnataḥ |
SA13n1145:65: krodhameva tu yo hanti tena sarve dviṣo hatāḥ ||30 ||
SA13n1145:69: prajñā hrāso na yāvadhdi tāvatkuryāt svayaṃ hitam ||32 ||
SA13n1145:70: vyabhicāreṣvāsattaḥ rājā tasya hi nirakṣaro mantri |
SA13n1145:71: tadā dhanāśā kutra rakṣyā asavaḥ prayatnena ||33 ||
SA13n1145:75: kākaścālayet pākaṃ vastūnāṃ tatra kā kathā ||35 ||
SA13n1145:77: puṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ vicinvīta mūlocchedaṃ na kārayet ||36 ||
SA13n1145:78: valmīkaṃ madhujātaṃ ca śuklapakṣe ca candramāḥ |
SA13n1145:80: hīnatā yācane yatra syāttatra na ca yācyatām |
SA13n1145:81: kāmaṃ hi na bhavedindro himājjīvati tittariḥ ||38 ||
SA13n1145:82: mayūra ! grīṣmasya tu tāpayukta āśāyutaḥ khasya jale bhavestvam |
SA13n1145:83: kaṇṭhantu no nāmaya gauraveṇa nīre taḍāgasya tu dūṣitasya ||39 ||
SA13n1145:88: sarpāḥ pibanti pavanaṃ na ca durbalāste
SA13n1145:92: sa śobhate puṣpitapuṣpavacca sumaṇḍitaṃ yasya mukhaṃ suvarṇaiḥ |
SA13n1145:93: anakṣaraṃ yasya mukhaṃ bhavecvet tannetravaktre bhubi chidravacca ||42 ||
SA13n1145:94: muktāmaṇibhyāṃ ca hi gardabhasya kiṃ śūkarasya priyabhojanena |
SA13n1145:95: andhasyadīptyā badhirasya gītaimūrkhasya dharmeṇa kimasti kṛtyam ||43 ||
SA13n1145:100: kṣatiṃ bihāya yenāpi prayogeṇa hitasya kim |
SA13n1145:104: kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ |
SA13n1145:105: rogāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā mārgāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na vīryam ||48 ||
SA13n1145:106: dhanalipsuḥ suhrit tyājyā bhāryā ca vyabhicāriṇī |
SA13n1145:107: adharmī ca nṛpaḥ krūro mantrī piśuna eva ca ||49 ||
SA13n1145:108: kupradeśo hi durvyavasāyo duṣṭo'tha vai suhṛt |
SA13n1145:109: baidyo'dakṣo'pi duḥsevyam vastu heyā ime'pi ca ||50 ||
SA13n1145:115: aho ! susadṛśī ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca ||53 ||
SA13n1145:116: yathā bāryo na laśunasya gandhaḥ kastūrikācandanacandrasaṃjñaiḥ |
SA13n1145:117: tathā na vāryā varaśāstraśikṣā'bhyāsena duṣṭasya ca duṣṭatā'pi ||54 ||
SA13n1145:119: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ ||55 ||
SA13n1145:121: nyūne śaradi nīre hi nadīṃ sarve taranti ca ||56 ||
SA13n1145:124: duṣṭā narā bhṛtyagaṇo'vamānī praśikṣitā naiva hayāḥ kubhāryā |
SA13n1145:125: pratāḍanenaiva bhavanti namrāḥ sukarmayogyā na kadāpi caite ||58 ||
SA13n1145:126: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam |
SA13n1145:127: vṛthā dānaṃ samarthasya vṛthā hīnasya satkṛtiḥ ||59 ||
SA13n1145:128: padmāni satputramukhe lasanti rohanti nūnaṃ kulaṭāsutasya |
SA13n1145:129: viṣasya patrāṇi yathā karoti duṣkarma yo vai labhate phalantat ||60 ||
SA13n1145:130: abhracchāyā khale prītiḥ sidhdamannaṃ ca yoṣitaḥ
SA13n1145:132: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛdhdā madyaṃ ca taruṇaṃ dadhi |
SA13n1145:133: nakte bhojo divā svāpaḥ ṣaḍete prāṇahāriṇaḥ ||62 ||
SA13n1145:136: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamāno ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kunarasya sevā |
SA13n1145:138: karmī hyalābhī balino'pakartā darpī ca bhikṣurhyadhanaḥ sukhārthī |
SA13n1145:146: yācakaḥ svādubhoji ca darpī bhikṣāparo bhavet |
SA13n1145:148: sakṛjjalpanti rājānaḥ āryo hi dṛśyate sakṛt |
SA13n1145:161: na dṛśyate tena gṛhe tu patnyāḥ kāmādimithyācaraṇaṃ kukṛtam ||76 ||
SA13n1145:163: pāre gatasya kiṃ nāvā kāntayā kiṃ virāgiṇaḥ ||77 ||
SA13n1145:165: gūḍhe vacasi bhojye'sti prīti pṛthagjanasya ca ||78 ||
SA13n1145:166: śaile śaile na māṇikyaṃ mīne mīne na mauktim |
SA13n1145:167: sādhavo he na sarvatra candanaṃ na vane vane ||79 ||
SA13n1145:175: vinītāya ca śāntāya janāya kā sahiṣṇutā ||82 ||
SA13n1145:181: aṅkamāruhya suptasya hantuḥ kiṃ nāma pauruṣam ||85 ||
SA13n1145:182: kaumāre pitarau pātaḥ bhartrī rakṣati yauvane |
SA13n1145:184: āsaktirna bhaveddyāvat tāvattu guṇa eva saḥ |
SA13n1145:189: bālaḥ payasā dagdho dadhyapi fūtkṛtya bhakṣayati ||89 ||
SA13n1145:196: śiṣṭā na gṛhṇanti purā pratijñāṃ gṛhṇanti cet te kaṭhinapratijñām |
SA13n1145:197: aṅgikṛtāṃ tāṃ paripālayanti pāṣāṇarekhāmiva te tadānīm ||93 ||
SA13n1145:198: prāpnoti vittaṃ hyadhamo ti kiñcid garvī pareṣāmavamānanāyām |
SA13n1145:199: saṃjāyate labdhadhanaḥ sumartyaḥ supakvadhānyena samaṃ vinamraḥ ||94 ||
SA13n1145:204: guṇā guṇajñeṣu guṇā bhavanti te nirguṇaṃ prāpya bhavanti doṣāḥ |
SA13n1145:205: susvādu toyāḥ prabhavanti nadyaḥ samudramāsādya bhavantyapeyāḥ ||97 ||
SA13n1145:208: alpā dṛḍhā ye mṛdubhāṣiṇaśca tebhyo'vadhānaṃ karaṇīyameva |
SA13n1145:209: niryāti sūryaḥ saghanādhdi meghāt syāt tatprakāśastu tadā'titīkṣṇaḥ ||99 ||
SA13n1145:210: śāntipriyāḥ syuḥ khalu yauvane'pi vaiduṣya evaṃ vinatā bhaveyuḥ |
SA13n1145:215: upekṣate tatra sukhaṃ na ceha janaḥ prapātastha ivāsti cāndhaḥ ||102 ||
SA13n1145:216: ye kleśarogiṇo bhuktvā na ca saddharmabheṣajam |
SA13n1145:217: pramattā viṣayāsaktā bhavābdhiṃ na taranti te ||103 ||
SA13n1145:221: śvastanaṃ cādya kuryācca pūrva madhyāhnikaṃ varam ||105 ||
SA13n1145:225: sato jīvanamanto vā varaṃ tvākheṭakasya na ||107 ||
SA13n1145:227: gātheyaṃ bhāratīyopādhyāyavinayacandreṇa bhoṭadeśīya lokacakṣu bhikṣuṇā dharmaprajñenānūditā nirṇītāceti |
